metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. The URL used to get graph information for your cloud. Ex https://graph.microsoft.com/
Inventory - If true (Yes), then when an AD User is marked as disabled (Account enabled = false), they will be considered as orphaned. Default is false (No)
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

not_writing_completion_to_coe_metadata_t.inputs: not writing to metadata table for API reasons

parameters.$select: admin_makerisorphaned, admin_userisserviceprinciple, admin_useremail, admin_company, admin_department, admin_displayname, admin_city, admin_stateorprovince, admin_country, admin_preferredlanguage, admin_makerid, admin_userprincipalname, admin_managerid, admin_accountenabled, admin_managerdisplayname

early_short_circuit.description: will rethink a way to make the rest less costly and called. but adding early bail here for now

Just_Inserted_by_another_run_-_NoOp.inputs: catching for race condition. another flow just inserted this user. Nothing to do

Force_Failure.inputs: all other cases are real failures so fail

Just_Inserted_by_another_run_-_NoOp_-_Se.inputs: catching for race condition. another flow just inserted this user. Nothing to do

Force_Failure_-_Service_Principle.inputs: all other cases are real failures so fail

parameters.$select: city,country,department,jobTitle,officeLocation,statusCode,userPrincipalName, displayName, id, companyName, preferredLanguage, mail, accountenabled, state

admin_makerisorphaned, admin_userisserviceprinciple, admin_useremail, admin_company, admin_department, admin_displayname, admin_city, admin_stateorprovince, admin_country, admin_preferredlanguage, admin_makerid, admin_userprincipalname, admin_managerid, admin_accountenabled, admin_managerdisplayname

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
